messages.content: In the future, what will be the main cause of the sudden disappearance of all clouds in the sky? A. The invention of cloud - shrinking shoes. B. Aliens coming to collect clouds for their cloud museums. C. Trees deciding to absorb clouds instead of carbon dioxide. D. The moon pulling clouds away with its new super - magnetism.
The correct answer is: A. The invention of cloud - shrinking shoes.

The correct answer is: A. Use a magnifying glass to send Morse code.

The correct answer is: A. The color of the moon on Tuesdays.

In modern global times, what is the main reason for the moon turning into cheese? A. Global warming. B. The invention of smartphones. C. Increased population in Antarctica. D. The color of the ocean changing.
The correct answer is: A. Global warming
